name: DWS Group GmbH & Co. KGaA
description: DWS Group GmbH & Co. KGaA is a global asset management firm headquartered in Frankfurt, Germany. It is a leading provider of investment solutions and services, managing assets for a diverse range of clients, including institutions, corporations, and individual investors. Established in 1956, DWS has built a strong reputation for its comprehensive investment strategies across various asset classes, including equities, fixed income, and alternative investments. The firm emphasizes a client-centric approach, offering tailored solutions to meet the unique needs of its clients while maintaining a commitment to responsible investing. DWS is known for its innovative investment products, including mutual funds, exchange-traded funds (ETFs), and private market solutions. As a member of the Deutsche Bank Group, DWS leverages its extensive research capabilities and global reach to deliver superior investment performance. The company is also focused on sustainability and incorporates environmental, social, and governance (ESG) criteria into its investment processes, aiming to contribute positively to society while delivering value to its investors. With a presence in key financial markets around the world, DWS continues to evolve and adapt to changing market dynamics, ensuring it remains a preferred partner for investment management.

seo.meta_description: Discover DWS Group, a leading global asset management firm providing innovative investment solutions and sustainable investment strategies.

faq.question: What is DWS Group known for?
faq.answer: DWS Group is known for its comprehensive asset management services and innovative investment solutions.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of DWS Group?
faq.answer: Asoka Wöhrmann is the CEO of DWS Group GmbH & Co. KGaA.

faq.question: Where is DWS Group headquartered?
faq.answer: DWS Group is headquartered in Frankfurt, Germany.

faq.question: What investment products does DWS offer?
faq.answer: DWS offers a range of investment products, including equity funds, fixed income funds, ETFs, and sustainable investment solutions.
